oracle.ateam.sample.mobile.controller.bean

Class ConnectivityBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.ateam.sample.mobile.controller.bean.ConnectivityBean

  • public class ConnectivityBean
extends java.lang.Object
    This class returns the network connectivity status. It also supports a "forceOffline" mode, by calling the forceOffline or setForceOffline methods. It can be defined as a managed bean to allow easy access to online/offline status, and to force/unforce offline mode. The forceOffline flag is saved as static variable, so it doesn;t matter which instance of this bean is used to change the value.
